contract_type.explanation: The document is titled 'THIRTY-FIRST AMENDMENT TO FIRST LIEN ISDA 2002 MASTER AGREEMENT,' explicitly identifying it as an ISDA Master Agreement amendment.

contract_date.explanation: The recitals state the original First Lien ISDA 2002 Master Agreement was dated as of March 17, 2016. This is the main contract date for the initial agreement.

amendment_date.explanation: The amendment is stated to be 'entered into as of April 26, 2023' in the opening paragraph.

amendment_number.explanation: The document is titled 'THIRTY-FIRST AMENDMENT,' which clearly indicates this is the 31st amendment.

version_type.explanation: The document is an amendment, as stated in the title and opening paragraph.

status.explanation: The document is labeled 'Execution Version,' which typically indicates an executed contract.
